attributes.action: Enforce the leave campaign's pledge to give £350m per week to the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
If the £350m isn't allocated as extra funding to the NHS then we call for a new referendum, based on truths and actual promises so the British public can make a better informed decision. A decision for the country, not for the ego of politicians. 

This referendum and the conduct applied throughout has destroyed confidence in U.K. politics.
attributes.background: Most people voted leave in the EU referendum based on the slogans / pledges made. These pledges should be just as binding as the result to leave the EU.
